title: How to Clean Your House or Apartment Quickly and Effectively

steps.title: Get a garbage bag, the bigger the better, and do a walkthrough of your entire home.
steps.content: Get a garbage bag, the bigger the better, and do a walkthrough of your entire home. Pick up and throw away ANY trash. Including emptying the small cans in bathrooms and in bedrooms. When you are done empty the big can in the kitchen and put all bags outside for pick up. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Do another walk through and pick up ALL dirty clothes.
steps.content: Do another walk through and pick up ALL dirty clothes. Don't forget those dirty towels in the bathrooms. Take them to the laundry room and put a load on to wash. The perfect time to do a load of laundry is while cleaning your home. If you use a laundry mat, stuff everything into a laundry bag or basket and set it aside for washing another day. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Do another walkthrough and gather dirty dishes.
steps.content: Do another walkthrough and gather dirty dishes. Take 'em back to the kitchen and wash dishes. Wash, dry, and put away if possible. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Now it's time for dusting.
steps.content: Now it's time for dusting. Get two rags. One is for wood and one is for everything else. Spray pledge on the "wood" rag and simply dampen the other. Go through each room dusting EVERYTHING that could collect dust. It is important to do this before vacuuming. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Go back and clean the kitchen and bathroom surfaces.
steps.content: Go back and clean the kitchen and bathroom surfaces. Countertops, microwave, stove, sinks, tubs and toilets. Use any "multi-surface" cleaner. Putting away all miscellaneous items as you go. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Grab the vacuum and hit the entire house.
steps.content: Grab the vacuum and hit the entire house. Go back and forth slowly hitting high traffic areas in doorways and in front of sofas a few extra times.

steps.title: Do a whole house walkthrough putting away any misplaced items and straightening things like chairs out of place or a magazine on the nightstand.
steps.content: Do a whole house walkthrough putting away any misplaced items and straightening things like chairs out of place or a magazine on the nightstand. YOU ARE DONE!
